experience.title: Fund Data Consultant
experience.description: -Focusing on a range of Open-End funds, Closed End Funds and ETF/ETPs. Also working with AIFs, SICARs, LTAFs, ELTIFs and Hedge Fund structures.-Geographical focus on EMEA funds such as those domiciled in the UK, Ireland, Luxembourg as well as some exposure to US and South African domiciles-Active procurement of new datasets, including advanced portfolio reporting templates for derivatives such as TPT, as well as fund documentation (such as PRIIPS KIDs, UCITS KIIDs, Prospectuses, Annual Reports, EMT…)-Conducting in-person and virtual meetings for data negotiations and relationship maintenance-Help with projects across the company to provide insight on data process and collection. This extends to helping identify and consult on the potential new data sets and fund structures that can be onboarded for the evaluation of the business proposition  -Expert in Morningstar data processes (including the ratings and methodologies) to answer and clients/ funds companies questions/ issues-Back end analysis of NAVs, Price Data, Distribution and Holdings Data to maintain accuracy on our platforms-Leading and helping with projects to gather market information regarding new regulations and fund structures. A recent example being the new LTAF, ELTIF and SDR regulations. This involves taking in-person meetings to answer fund managers questions on our approach on the matters-Liaising with data vendors to establish data feeds and negotiate new data transmissions and acquisitions
